data.description: Provides an overview of the formal theory literature in international relations, including international security and international political economy.
data.title: FORMAL MODELS OF INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS

data.description: An introduction to the tools of game theoretic analysis, with reference to the use of game theory in political science. Intended for those desiring a basic familiarity with the theory, and  for those planning further work in formal modeling.
data.title: GAME THEORY AND POLITICAL ANALYSIS
